com.facebook.buck.core.graph.transformation

Interface GraphTransformationEngine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGraphTransformationEngine

    public interface GraphTransformationEngine
extends AutoCloseable
    Transformation engine that transforms supplied ComputeKey into ComputeResult via GraphComputation. This engine is able to asynchronously run graph based computation, reusing results when possible. Note that the computation graph must be an acyclic graph.

    This engine is able to deal with dependencies in the computation graph by having GraphComputation request dependent results of other transformations through GraphComputation.discoverPreliminaryDeps(ComputeKey) and GraphComputation.discoverDeps(ComputeKey, ComputationEnvironment)
